file_text_eoln: With this function you can get GameMaker Studio 2 to check the currently opened file to see if the line being read has finished. The function returns <tt>true</tt> if the end of the line has been reached and <tt>false</tt> otherwise.
The id of the file to check.

{ANY_CODE} var file = file_text_open_read(working_directory + "Game_Data.txt");
var num = 0; while (!file_text_eoln(file))
{nbsp_x4}{
{nbsp_x4}score_array[num] = file_text_read_real(file);
{nbsp_x4}num++;
{nbsp_x4}}
file_text_close(file);
The above code opens a file for reading then reads the values from a single line into an array.
